text: The area of Kudo District in Hiyama Subprefecture. is a district located in Hiyama Subprefecture, Hokkaido, Japan. As of 2004, the district has an estimated population of 2,458 and a density of 18.36 persons per km². The total area is 133.91 km². ==Towns and villages== *Setana (Taisei and Kitahiyama were merged into Setana in 2005) Category:Districts in Hokkaido
title: Kudō District, Hokkaido
